post.description:
Sign In with GitHub.
token: Base64 encoded GitHub access_token

200.description: logged in successfully. User with this provider already exists

meta.message: You have successfully logged in with GitHub.

201.description: signed in successfully. User with this provider has been created

meta.message: You have successfully signed in with GitHub.

422.description: token encoding is broken or user parameters are not valid

errors.title: Unprocessable Entity
detail: Can't decode GitHub token

424.description: Error at dependent service (Github error response or no connection)

errors.title: Timeout at dependent service
detail: timeout

post.description:
Sign In with VK.
vk_code: * Base64 encoded VK code
